data.title: This is the place for Pho!
data.text: I am very happy we tried Pho Vinh tonight.  Pho was very good, Bun Bo Hue was also authentic and good.  Now I don't need to make it at home and can enjoy it when I crave the comfort and warmth of Pho.  Service was also very attentive.  Now that the weather is getting cooler, we will be back often!

data.title: Terrible Waiter
data.text: We have dined here several times since the restaurant opened in the summer. The food is ok, but the waiter's service was terrible. My wife and I always ordered two different noodles. They look a like but have different ingredients. I hate my wife's noodle, but my wife likes both of them and is not sensitive of the tastes. The last time when we dined, the waiter misplaced our orders. Insensitive of the taste, my wife ate half of my noodle while I was eating spring rolls. And I realized the noodle was not mine when I was eating it. I told the waiter the mistake politely. Then the guy got angry and said he did not make the food. Now I got upset and told the owner the mistake and his behavior. I will never come back to this restaurant.

data.title: Authentic Vietnamese Food
data.text:
Finally, we found this newly opened Vietnamese Restaurant near West Bloomfield. Love the pork egg noodles. I thought I only could find good Vietnamese food in California. This place is as good as the noodles in Ho Chi Minh. 
The restaurant is very clean and service is good as well ,

data.title: おいしい でもあともうひと息
data.text:
食べやすい味だと思いました。
辛味はもう少し欲しいところだけれど。
生春巻きのソースはピーナツバターベースだけれど物足らない。

フォーもカレーも優しい味。
あまり特徴がないといえばない。
